channel.title: [Client Project]RuneLimited
channel.description:
[center] [IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/30cvtyx.jpg[/img] Well people have been asking about this client and telling me I should make a project thread, so I will. This thread isn't going to be an update blog, I'll just be showing what I've done so far and what I've accomplished and explaining and going into a little detail about how I did certain things. However, a small update log will be included at the bottom of the thread. [B][U]Basic Information[/U][/B] [I]RuneLimited client is a client built to improve your RSPS experience. With good performance, tons of features, and almost all of the latest RuneScape client features, this client will fill all of your needs. This client project was started and will be pursued and finished by Galkon.[/I] ___________________ [B][U]FaQ[/U][/B] [I]Q: Will this client be released? A: Yes, it will be released [i]closed source[/i] to the public. Q: Can I test the client? A: I will let you test it when I need testing. Q: Are you going to make tutorials for anything? A: No, I'm not. Q: Are you going to release the source? A: No, as I have stopped working on RuneLimited[server], I do not use a specific source.[/I] ___________________ [B][U]Features[/U][/B] [I]-100% HD[502+] GameFrame implemented -100% Clicking sidebars + sideicons/redstones positioning -100% Chat channels + right clicking w/ toggling -100% Minimap/compass moved to fit the game frame -100% RuneScape chatbox w/scrollbar + clicking -100% Text positioning/alignment [chat channel text, chat box text, orb text, etc] -Working HP orb w/ text colors[75-100% = green, etc] and filling/depleting -Working Prayer orb w/ text colors[75-100% = green, etc] and filling/depleting -All skillcapes w/ hoods, godswords/bandos/armadyl, and more[/I] ___________________ [B][U]Future Goals/Updates[/U][/B] [I]-Working Running orb w/ text colors[75-100% = green, etc] and filling/depleting -Replace current cache with an untouched 377 cache, re-add skillcapes and other items without replacing old items/models -Fix some log-in issues and add log in scroll -Add some interfaces like real RuneScape[/I] ___________________ [B][U]Features' Information[/U][/B] [U]Orbs[/U] - [I]Each individual orb is loaded in its own method. The HP orb is loaded in hpOrb(); in drawMinimap, and the Prayer orb is loaded as prayerOrb();. In each method it includes the drawing of the empty orb and the icon for the orb [e.g. heart for HP]. They also contain the necessary strings and ints to use variables like HPPercent, in stuff like: if(HPPercent > 90), etcetera.[/I] [u]Running Orb[/u] - [i]The running orb is drawn onto the gameframe just as the other orbs are, however, it is not as good as the other orbs. The running orb is only that, the orb. Due to an error caused by parsing RSInterface.interfaceCache[149] into a usable int for converting your current energy into a usable percentage, I cannot make the orb fill/deplete, or change text color when depleting. Currently, it only displays a %1%, as shown in the picture in the[/i] [B][U]Media[/U][/B] [i]section of this thread.[/i] [U]Chatbox[/U] - [I]The chatbox is literally 100% like RuneScape's. The text is alligned 100% to RuneScape's chatbox text. The scrollbar is alligned perfectly, along with its clicking. It also has a customized administrative crown, although it just has an A instead of an M.[/I] [u]GameFrame[/u] - [i]The gameframe being used is a gameframe that is identical in almost every single way[except for a few colors changes to the brown by the minimap] to a 502+, or an "HD" era client. Every single aspect of it is completely uneditted, minus the brown next to the minimap. It has been photoshopped to be more smooth after removing the orbs next to the map, so the orbs can be loaded individually.[/i] [I]More to come.[/I] ___________________ [B][U]Media[/U][/B] [URL=http://i34.tinypic.com/23u1zxl.jpg]Early Progress[PNG Picture][/URL] [URL=http://i38.tinypic.com/2lazonr.jpg]Orb Filling/Depleting[PNG Picture][/URL] [URL=http://i34.tinypic.com/2jdhm48.jpg]HP Orb Filling/Depleting[GIF Animation][/URL] [URL=http://i37.tinypic.com/1h9py1.jpg]Run Orb Drawing(early stage)[PNG Picture][/URL] [I]More to come.[/I] ___________________ [B][U]Update Log[/U][/B][/center]
[U][B]Saturday, December 6, 2008[/B][/U] Started project thread. HP orb depleting/filling completed. Cleaned up some code. [U][B]Sunday, December 7, 2008[/B][/U] Updated project thread with pictures. Prayer orb depleting/filling completed. Fixed chatbox glitches. Fixed 6 minute disconnection. [U][B]Monday, December 8, 2008[/B][/U] Updated project thread. Added running orb drawing. Text is displayed, does not change color. Orb does not deplete/fill due to an error parsing RSInterface.interfaceCache[149].message into an int. [u][b]Sunday, December 28, 2008[/b][/u] Restarted project. Coming up with new orb concept. Redoing minimap/orb concept.

item.title: [Client Project]RuneLimited
item.dc:creator: @GalkonsPride GalkonsPride
item.description:
@GalkonsPride wrote:

It will give you the benefits of chat channels like RuneScape’s, more organized and clean and smooth graphics, unlike most sloppy 317’s.

Also, it has the advantage of now-filling orbs with text, which I always hate going from real RS to RSPS’s and look at the orbs that aren’t there on a 317 client. No more of that!

Read full topic

item.title: [Client Project]RuneLimited
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

If

message

is a String, use Integer.parseInt(message); If its a byte array, do

Integer.parseInt(new String(message));

Also, ifs its and RSString, theres a method in RSString to get the underlying bytes of the String. Then use those to construct a normal String and then parse the integer. Also, use substring to chop off the last character. (The % sign)

And put that in a try/catch block, just incase the server sends weird crap.

Read full topic

@GalkonsPride wrote:

[quote=“akl, post:7, topic:249533”]Really sexy.
But the orbs only work like when I drink prayer pot or they work normally like rs?[/quote]

They work like RS. HP orb depletes when health is lost, whether its from combat or anything else, it depletes.

Prayer depletes as long as a prayer is on and the server has prayer draining.

item.title: [Client Project]RuneLimited
item.dc:creator: @GalkonsPride GalkonsPride
item.description:
@GalkonsPride wrote:

[center]

Well people have been asking about this client and telling me I should make a project thread, so I will. This thread isn’t going to be an update blog, I’ll just be showing what I’ve done so far and what I’ve accomplished and explaining and going into a little detail about how I did certain things. However, a small update log will be included at the bottom of the thread.

Basic Information
RuneLimited client is a client built to improve your RSPS experience. With good performance, tons of features, and almost all of the latest RuneScape client features, this client will fill all of your needs. This client project was started and will be pursued and finished by Galkon.

FaQ
[I]Q: Will this client be released?
A: Yes, it will be released closed source to the public.

Q: Can I test the client?
A: I will let you test it when I need testing.

Q: Are you going to make tutorials for anything?
A: No, I’m not.

Q: Are you going to release the source?
A: No, as I have stopped working on RuneLimited[server], I do not use a specific source.[/I]

Features
-100% HD[502+] GameFrame implemented
-100% Clicking sidebars + sideicons/redstones positioning
-100% Chat channels + right clicking w/ toggling
-100% Minimap/compass moved to fit the game frame
-100% RuneScape chatbox w/scrollbar + clicking
-100% Text positioning/alignment [chat channel text, chat box text, orb text, etc]
-Working HP orb w/ text colors[75-100% = green, etc] and filling/depleting
-Working Prayer orb w/ text colors[75-100% = green, etc] and filling/depleting
-All skillcapes w/ hoods, godswords/bandos/armadyl, and more

Future Goals/Updates
-Working Running orb w/ text colors[75-100% = green, etc] and filling/depleting
-Replace current cache with an untouched 377 cache, re-add skillcapes and other items without replacing old items/models
-Fix some log-in issues and add log in scroll
-Add some interfaces like real RuneScape

Features’ Information
Orbs - Each individual orb is loaded in its own method. The HP orb is loaded in hpOrb(); in drawMinimap, and the Prayer orb is loaded as prayerOrb();. In each method it includes the drawing of the empty orb and the icon for the orb [e.g. heart for HP]. They also contain the necessary strings and ints to use variables like HPPercent, in stuff like: if(HPPercent > 90), etcetera.

Running Orb - The running orb is drawn onto the gameframe just as the other orbs are, however, it is not as good as the other orbs. The running orb is only that, the orb. Due to an error caused by parsing RSInterface.interfaceCache[149] into a usable int for converting your current energy into a usable percentage, I cannot make the orb fill/deplete, or change text color when depleting. Currently, it only displays a %1%, as shown in the picture in the Media section of this thread.

Chatbox - The chatbox is literally 100% like RuneScape’s. The text is alligned 100% to RuneScape’s chatbox text. The scrollbar is alligned perfectly, along with its clicking. It also has a customized administrative crown, although it just has an A instead of an M.

GameFrame - The gameframe being used is a gameframe that is identical in almost every single way[except for a few colors changes to the brown by the minimap] to a 502+, or an “HD” era client. Every single aspect of it is completely uneditted, minus the brown next to the minimap. It has been photoshopped to be more smooth after removing the orbs next to the map, so the orbs can be loaded individually.

More to come.

Media
Early Progress[PNG Picture]
Orb Filling/Depleting[PNG Picture]
HP Orb Filling/Depleting[GIF Animation]
Run Orb Drawing(early stage)[PNG Picture]

More to come.

Update Log[/center]

[U][B]Saturday, December 6, 2008[/B][/U] Started project thread. HP orb depleting/filling completed. Cleaned up some code.

Sunday, December 7, 2008
Updated project thread with pictures.
Prayer orb depleting/filling completed.
Fixed chatbox glitches.
Fixed 6 minute disconnection.

Monday, December 8, 2008
Updated project thread.
Added running orb drawing. Text is displayed, does not change color. Orb does not deplete/fill due to an error parsing RSInterface.interfaceCache[149].message into an int.

Sunday, December 28, 2008
Restarted project.
Coming up with new orb concept.
Redoing minimap/orb concept.

Read full topic
